about_the_game:
In a dystopic world where video games are getting more and more expensive, you decide to go on a journey to collect all games available.

Game Collector is a time management simulation/strategy game where you beat minigames for money, buy games for fun and develop strategies to manage your money and fun. But there are more factors to consider: weather, heating, mails...

  • Unique Minigames

    Embrace a multitude of jobs, each brimming with unique minigames that test your diverse skills. Sweep floors as a janitor, speed down the highway as a taxi driver, or race against the clock as a programmer. Progress in your career to unlock better jobs.




  • Collect Games

    While money is essential for your journey, don't forget about your games. Purchase games and dive into them to replenish your fun. Collect every available game to achieve your dreams as a legendary game collector!
    Please note that there are no minigames for games, just sit down and relax while filling your fun!



  • Unlock New Regions

    As you progress, journey to new houses in different regions, each with its unique weather, fresh game collections to explore, and new job opportunities to seize. Your progress promises not just a change of scenery but an expansion of your game-collecting empire. Explore new places, and keep collecting games!



  • Manage Your Money

    Carefully weigh your options: will you allocate your money to cover rent, buy new games, invest in a better home, or take risks to multiply your wealth? Your financial choices will shape your journey, and the fate of your game collection hangs in the balance. Make every dollar count!

  • 3 Difficulty Modes

    Your adventure awaits with a choice of three difficulty modes. Start with the Beginner level to grasp the basics, then graduate to the Advanced mode to put your strategies to the ultimate test. These diverse difficulty options not only cater to every player type but also significantly boost the game's replayability. Are you up for the challenge?

  • Risky Investments

    Your mailbox is a mixed bag of opportunities and pitfalls. Expect a variety of mails, some offering free money, others tempting you with loans, and a few just inviting you to play games. But be careful; scammers lurk around every corner. Choose wisely, while smart strategies can aid to your journey, mistakes can ruin it all.

  • Weather's Unpredictable Influence

    Weather can cause various difficulties. It can obstruct your daily commute, plunge you into sudden blackouts, or hike up your expenses during extreme temperatures. Be careful!

    Are you ready to go on a journey to become a legendary game collector?

name: Game Collector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 or 16:10 monitor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 monitor

short_description: Become the ultimate game collector in this time management simulation/strategy game! Beat minigames for money, relax by playing your games, develop strategies to balance money and fun. Begin your journey to become a legendary game collector!
